ReshiramCCMod.name: Reshiram
ReshiramCCMod.description:
<c=f4f7f0>RESHIRAM</c>
A legendary dragon that represents truth. Its cards utilize <c=ff687d>heat</c> alongside <c=boldPink>other debuffs</c> to damage enemy ships.

Flame Orb.name: Flame Orb
Flame Orb.description: At start of combat, enemy gains 1 <c=status>flammable</c>.

description.None: Attack for <c=redd>{{damageString}}</c>. Apply 1 <c=ff687d>heat</c>. If enemy is <c=ff687d>overheating</c>, apply 1 <c=285cc4>flammable</c>.
description.A: Attack for <c=redd>{{damageString}}</c>. Apply 2 <c=ff687d>heat</c>. If enemy is <c=ff687d>overheating</c>, apply 1 <c=285cc4>flammable</c>.
description.B: Attack for <c=redd>{{damageString}}</c>. Apply 1 <c=ff687d>heat</c>. If enemy is <c=ff687d>overheating</c>, apply 2 <c=285cc4>flammable</c>.

Smoldering.name: Smoldering
Smoldering.description:
After heat is inflicted, take <c=boldPink>{0}</c> hull damage if above the <c=ff687d>overheating</c> threshold.
<c=ff687d>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>
